snippet: Ryo Ishikawa, 20, is committed to playing on the Japanese Tour, but he may be delaying the inevitable, with an opportunity to secure full status on the PGA Tour for 2013.
abstract: Golfer Ryo Ishikawa is committed to playing on the Japanese Tour, but he may be delaying the inevitable, with an opportunity to secure full status on the PGA Tour for 2013.
lead_paragraph: Ryo Ishikawa, 20, is committed to playing on the Japanese Tour, but he may be delaying the inevitable, with an opportunity to secure full status on the PGA Tour for 2013.

headline.seo: Ryo Ishikawa Feels Obligation to Japanese Tour, but Dreams of PGA
headline.main: One Star Torn Between Two Tours
headline.print_headline: One Star Torn Between Two Tours
